title: [feature request] Official build for cuda 9.1?
body_html:
Hi pytorch team,

Looks like there is no official cuda 9.1 build for 0.4.1 anymore? We were using the official cuda 9.1 build for 0.4.0. Upgrading to 0.4.1 broke our production pipeline because http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu91/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl returns 403.

Just wanted to check in with you before we switch to our own internal build process.

Thanks,
body_text:

Just wanted to check in with you before we switch to our own internal build process.
Thanks,
body:
Hi pytorch team,

Looks like there is no official cuda 9.1 build for 0.4.1 anymore? We were using the official cuda 9.1 build for 0.4.0. Upgrading to 0.4.1 broke our production pipeline because `http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu91/torch-0.4.1-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl` returns 403.

Just wanted to check in with you before we switch to our own internal build process.

Thanks,
